title: Dave: The Boy Who Played the Harp breaks UK album record
description: The Boy Who Played the Harp dethrones Taylor Swift and keeps Lily Allen off the top spot.
content:
Dave has become the first British rap artist to debut three albums at number one in the UK's official chart.
His latest, The Boy Who Played The Harp, knocked Taylor Swift's Life of a Showgirl off the top spot, and managed to fend off competition from... [2070 chars]

title: Premier League confirms Manchester United v Newcastle is only Boxing Day game
description: The Premier League has confirmed there will be only one Premier League game on Boxing Day, with Manchester United to host Newcastle United at 8pm
content: The Premier League has confirmed there will be only one Premier League game on Boxing Day, with Manchester United to host Newcastle United at 8pm. The late kick-off may cause travel issues for Newcastle fans, with public transport limited on the holi... [1993 chars]

title: UK man who murdered pregnant girlfriend after release from prison jailed for 42 years
description: Alana Odysseos, 32, was pregnant with her third child when she was killed by Shaine March in July last year
content:
A man who murdered his pregnant girlfriend after being released from prison on licence has been jailed for 42 years.
Alana Odysseos, 32, was in the early stages of pregnancy with her third child when she was killed by Shaine March last year at her ho... [3085 chars]

title: Man caught in livestreamed Havant paedophile sting jailed
description: Lee Comley is jailed for three years for trying to entice a 14-year-old girl into sexual activity.
content:
A man has been jailed for three years after "ugly" disorder broke out when his arrest was streamed live on Facebook during a paedophile sting.
